articles.author: Mauricio Torres, Michael Rios
articles.title: Colombian family files first known formal complaint over deadly US strike in Caribbean - CNN
articles.description: The family of a Colombian man believed to have been killed in a US strike in the Caribbean has filed what’s believed to be the first complaint against such attacks with the Inter-American Commission on Human Rights (IACHR).
